meanings.sent1: The kids jauped in the puddles after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to jaup water on the floor while washing dishes.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy jauped water all over the room during bath time.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered, ready to jaup rain on the dry fields below.
meanings.sent5: The excited toddler jauped paint on the canvas, creating a colorful mess.

meanings.definition: A splash or spatter of liquid
meanings.sent1: The jaup from the fountain felt refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: She felt a jaup of water hit her face as the car drove through a puddle.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a jaup of olive oil to the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent4: The sudden jaup of mud from the passing truck covered the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The playful otters created a jaup of water as they splashed in the pond.

meanings.definition: A sudden or unexpected event or occurrence
meanings.sent1: The jaup of thunder startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected jaup of laughter broke the silence in the library.
meanings.sent3: The jaup of confetti at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The jaup of applause filled the auditorium after the performance.
meanings.sent5: The jaup of fireworks lit up the night sky with bursts of color.
